channel.title: Helps!mez!
channel.description:
[size=15pt]OK...[/size]
im running barrowscape and heres what i got
compile=
@echo off COLOR 08 title shotscape Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause
when i run it it says there is an error reading "*.java"
help!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Helps!mez!
item.dc:creator: @Patchumz Patchumz
item.description:
@Patchumz wrote:

All you really need in that file is this

@echo off COLOR 08 title shotscape Client javac *.java pause

At least thats what i think…

Read full topic

item.title: Helps!mez!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Change

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp  *.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server

to

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp .; *.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server

Read full topic

item.title: Helps!mez!
item.dc:creator: @legolos598 legolos598
item.description:
@legolos598 wrote:

hold on lemmy try it then ill tell if it works[br][size=1]Posted at: October 28, 2006, 10:02:07 PM[/size][hr]didnotwork
^ ^
space[br][size=1]Posted at: October 28, 2006, 10:03:43 PM[/size][hr]this is what i did

name:CLASSPATH

variable:CLASSPATH=C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_06in;%CLASSPATH%;.

Read full topic

item.title: Helps!mez!
item.dc:creator: @DAWIGG DAWIGG
item.description:
@DAWIGG wrote:

o a javac error, go to start-my computer,right click it, go to properties,advanced,varibles,then press ad and put this is

CLASSPATH
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.

Read full topic

item.title: Helps!mez!
item.dc:creator: @legolos598 legolos598
item.description:
@legolos598 wrote:

[size=15pt]OK…[/size]

im running barrowscape and heres what i got

compile=

@echo off
COLOR 08
title shotscape Client
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause

when i run it it says there is an error reading “*.java”

help!!!

Read full topic
